qns.entity.node package

Submodules

qns.entity.node.app module

class qns.entity.node.app.Application[source]

Bases: object

Application can be deployed on the quantum nodes.

add_handler(handler: Callable[[EventT], bool | None], EventTypeList: type[EventT], ByList: list[Any] = [])[source]
add_handler(handler: Callable[[EventT], bool | None], EventTypeList: list[type[EventT]] = [], ByList: list[Any] = [])

Add a handler function to the dispatcher.

Parameters:

  • handler – The handler to process the event. It is an object method that accepts the event.

  • EventTypeList – a list of Event Class Type. An empty list meaning to match all events.

  • ByList – a list of Entities, QNodes or Applications, that generates this event. An empty list meaning to match all entities.

get_node() → Node[source]
get_node(*, node_type: type['NodeT']) → NodeT

Get the node that runs this application

Returns:

the quantum node

handle(event: Event) → bool | None[source]

Process the event on the node.

Parameters:

event (Event) – the event

Returns:

if skip is True, further applications will not handle this event

Return type:

skip (bool, None)

handle_sync_signal(signal_type: SignalTypeEnum)[source]

Invoked after receiving a sync signal.

install(node: Node, simulator: Simulator)[source]

Install initial events for this Node. Called from Node.install()

Parameters:

  • node (Node) – the node that will run this application

  • simulator (Simulator) – the simulator

property simulator: Simulator

Get the simulator

Returns:

the simulator

property sync_current_phase: SignalTypeEnum

Phase set from last sync signal, only relevant with SYNC timing mode.

Dispatch an Event that happens on this Node. This event is passed to every application in apps list in order.

class qns.entity.node.Application[source]

Bases: object

Application can be deployed on the quantum nodes.

add_handler(handler: Callable[[EventT], bool | None], EventTypeList: type[EventT] | list[type[EventT]] = [], ByList: list[Any] = [])[source]

Add a handler function to the dispatcher.

Parameters:

  • handler – The handler to process the event. It is an object method that accepts the event.

  • EventTypeList – a list of Event Class Type. An empty list meaning to match all events.

  • ByList – a list of Entities, QNodes or Applications, that generates this event. An empty list meaning to match all entities.

the quantum node
